name: Space Game Prototype
description:
This is an experimental project, where I am testing ideas about simplified controls, missile swarm dodging, and stylised visuals.

Currently, there is not much gameplay. Fly, shoot, dodge missiles, die. Use arrow keys to turn, and Z to fire. Turning is slower while firing, which gives greater accuracy.

If you or your enemy dies, nothing happens. Restart the game! Also, damage calculations are not really working right. This is just all about flying around.

I've been toying with the idea of adapting the concept for mobile devices, and making some kind of space exploration and trading game, but nothing concrete has been done for that.

(This is also an experiment in using OpenGL ES 2.0 as a cross-platform 3D API. With libraries like ANGLE, it is quite easy to get it running on Windows, without even requiring OpenGL drivers to be installed.)
